history.content:
I'm about half way through 188 right now without having taken 170 and I have had like no issues.  I posted this same question last semester and every response I got said that there is totally no need to take 170 before 188.  So I suggest you definitely go for 188.  

---

I think the common recommendation is to take 70 before 188. Having taken both 170 and 188, I don't believe there is much overlap between those two classes.

--

Tacking on to this, took 70 and 188 together and it was all good too!

I'm about half way through 188 right now without having taken 170 and I have had like no issues.  I posted this same question last semester and every response I got said that there is totally no need to take 170 before 188.  So I suggest you definitely go for 188.  

---

I think the common recommendation is to take 70 before 188. Having taken both 170 and 188, I don't believe there is much overlap between those two classes.

I'm about half way through 188 right now without having taken 170 and I have had like no issues.  I posted this same question last semester and every response I got said that there is totally no need to take 170 before 188.  So I suggest you definitely go for 188.

I see in a lot of places that people recommend taking 170 with or before 188, because a lot of the material is common between them I think. Due to some minor details about my schedule and the other classes I'm wanting to take, it's more convenient for me to take 188 next semester and hold out another semester to take 170, although I could definitely still take them at the same time if necessary. 

Any thoughts on whether taking 188 before 170 would be a significantly bad idea or somehow be a worse learning experience?
history.subject: CS 170 and 188
